definitions.definition: An organism, either vegetable or animal, which at its maturity has no generative organs , or but imperfectly developed ones, as a plant without stamens or pistils , as the garden Hydrangea ; especially, one of the imperfectly developed females of certain social insects, as of the ant and the common honeybee , which perform the labors of the community, and are called workers .
One who has been neutered; eunuch .
The act of neutering (typically an animal)
A person who takes no part in a contest ; someone remaining neutral .
A noun of the neuter gender ; any one of those words which have the terminations usually found in neuter words.
An intransitive verb or state-of-being verb.

main_definition: ( biology ) An organism, either vegetable or animal, which at its maturity has no generative organs , or but imperfectly developed ones, as a plant without stamens or pistils , as the garden Hydrangea ; especially, one of the imperfectly developed females of certain social insects, as of the ant and the common honeybee , which perform the labors of the community, and are called workers .
secondary_definitions: ( uncommon , sometimes offensive ) One who has been neutered; eunuch .
The act of neutering (typically an animal)
A person who takes no part in a contest ; someone remaining neutral .
( grammar ) A noun of the neuter gender ; any one of those words which have the terminations usually found in neuter words.
( grammar ) An intransitive verb or state-of-being verb.
